refentry.refsect1:
Constructors
Locale::__construct - create Locale
Locale::create- creates a new Locale. This method is useful when you prefer just to get null on error, as if you called locale_create.
&reftitle.methods;
getDefault - Gets the default locale value from the INTL global 'default_locale'
setDefault - sets the default runtime locale to $locale
getPrimaryLanguage - Gets the primary language for the input locale
getScript - Gets the script for the input locale
getRegion - Gets the region for the input locale
getAllVariants - Gets the variants for the input locale
getKeywords - Gets the keywords for the input locale
getDisplayName - Returns an appropriately localized display name for the input locale
getDisplayLanguage - Returns an appropriately localized display name for language of the input locale
getDisplayScript - Returns an appropriately localized display name for script of the input locale
getDisplayRegion - Returns an appropriately localized display name for region of the input locale
getDisplayVariant - Returns an appropriately localized display name for variants of the input locale
filterMatches - Checks if a $langtag filter matches with $locale according to
lookup - Searchs the items in $langtag for the best match to the language
composeLocale - Returns a correctly ordered and delimited locale ID
parseLocale - Returns a key-value array of locale ID subtag elements.
&reference.intl.Locale-constants;
